ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List maintenance windows
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List maintenance windows
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List existing maintenance windows, optionally filtered by service and/or team, or whether they are from the past, present or future.
A Maintenance Window is used to temporarily disable one or more Services for a set period of time.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#maintenance-windows)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List maintenance windows

List existing maintenance windows, optionally filtered by service and/or team, or whether they are from the past, present or future. A Maintenance Window is used to temporarily disable one or more Services for a set period of time. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#maintenance-windows)

Method: Get

OperationID: listMaintenanceWindows

EndPoint:

/maintenance_windows
